code: import{useRef,useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[todos,setTodos]=useState([]);const InputRef=useRef([]);const handleAddTodo=()=>{const text=InputRef.current.value;const newItem={completed:false,text};setTodos([...todos,newItem]);InputRef.current.value='';console.log(text);};const handleItemDone=e=>{const text=e.target.innerText;console.log(text);};const handleDeleteItem=index=>{const newTodos=[...todos];newTodos.splice(index,1);setTodos(newTodos);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:" CookFolio "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"to-do-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:todos.map((_ref,index)=>{let{text,completed}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:completed?"done":"",onClick:()=>handleItemDone(index),children:text},index),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>handleDeleteItem(index),className:"trash",children:"\u274C"})]});})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:InputRef,placeholder:"Enter item ..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddTodo,children:"Add"})]});}export default App;
